title: What is you best example of humans surviving incidents that should have killed them? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is Tsutomu Yamaguchi. He was simultaneously the most and least fortunate person on Earth. He was selling cars for Mitsubishi in Hiroshima, on August 6th, 1945. Since one can’t do business in a city that’s on fire, he returned home a day later. He lived in Nagasaki, and was still there on August 9th. He died in 2010.
